name: A (Short for A Good Time)
description:
Hello everyone,

Welcome to A (Short for A Good Time)! This is what happens when you have an idea and you don't finish. 1, 2, and 3 go on a strange adventure to discover themselves in the hyper-capitalist world of Final Fantasy 7. They will leave completely changed...

So the short version is, I tried to learn Twine and make something in a week, and I absolutely did not finish. But I had a great--if stressful--time of it!

So I'm submitting my incomplete project mostly as a proof of concept and to thank the organisers for giving me motivation. Currently I'm positive there are bugs and loads of things that don't link up properly, so I think I will keep working on this monstrosity until it approaches something I consider finished, and then release it properly at a later date.

In the full game we'll learn:

-What happened to 2 and 3?
-What's behind the swap door?
-What else does that strange old man have to say?

And last but not least:

-What the hell is going on?

Thanks to all who subject themselves to it for testing and competition purposes, and I hope this is an acceptable entry for the judges despite everything.

A
